kara.live_unavailable: You cannot play this karaoke in your browser. Either the video is in an unsupported format for browsers, or it has been disabled for legal reasons.

set_banner.forbidden_label: You cannot use this karaoke as your profile banner.

form.title: Report a problem
form.subtitle: We do our best to have a high-quality database, but sometimes some issues are still there. Thanks for your help!

comment.label: Comment
comment.placeholder: After 2 minutes, the lyrics aren't synchronised anymore.

thanks.text: Thanks! We will fix this issue as soon as possible: {url}

import.login_required: You must log in to send a song.
import.quota_count: You can still send {count} song. | You can still send {count} songs.
import.quota_reached: You have sent too many songs, please wait until some of them are accepted or refused before sending another.

desc.parents: If this song is an alternative version of another one, select its parent(s) to pre-fill this form.
desc.parents_public: When a user selects a parent song in the public interface, they'll see all their children / alternative versions.
desc.titles: Set all titles the song has in different languages. Usually, there's only one title.
desc.titles_default_language: Default title language should be the song's original title. For titles in non-latin languages (chinese, japanese, arabic, korean…), add a "Romanization" title and make it default.
desc.aliases: If the song is known as something else (abbreviations for example), set them here to help people find it through search. No need to use words already contained in the song title(s).

import.description: This form allows you to submit a karaoke to the {instance} team. It will not be immediately integrated in the karaoke database because it requires a validation. Please be patient. Your karaoke may be modified if it doesn't comply to the team rules.
import.check_in_progress: Please check the list of karaoke subs currently being made before sending us a song. This'll avoid duplicate work, and the world will thus be a better place.
import.documentation_link: Please read {instance}'s rules before submitting a song!
import.license_reminder: Your karaoke will be published with the {name} license
import.license_link: Learn more about this license by clicking here.
import.add_file_media_not_supported_error: {name} is not a supported media file, convert it to one of the following formats: {formats}
import.comment_tooltip: If you want to add a message for the maintainers or just say thanks, say it here!
import.lyrics_file_missing: The lyrics file is missing, this is appropriate only if you are sending an MKV file or a karaoke without lyrics (yes).
import.title: Title
import.title_tooltip: If you don't know, put the series' name here as well. In the case of an alternative version, name your title as: 'My title ~ Disco vers.' for example
import.titles_aliases_tooltip: Short names or alternative names, used for search.
import.series_tooltip: TV series, movie title, video game title, etc.
import.series_singers_required: Series, Sung by and From the music band cannot be empty at the same time.
import.franchises_tooltip: If the series is part of a franchise (like Gundam, Mario, Zelda, Naruto, etc.) enter it here.
import.collections_required: At least one collection must be checked
import.songorder_tooltip: Opening/Ending number. If this is the only opening/ending in the series, leave blank.
import.year_tooltip: Year when the series was broadcasted or the video was produced
import.singergroups_tooltip: If the singers belong to a music band, put them in here. The band will be displayed in the player and song lists instead of individual singers.
import.creators_tooltip: Entity that created the series. Can be animation studio, movie studio, or game studio.
import.authors_required: Author of the karaoke is required
import.groups_tooltip: Download groups for this song. The song will be included in these download packs
import.parents_tooltip: If a parent is defined, this karaoke will show as alternative to the selected parent karaoke(s).
import.add_error: An error has occurred, karaoke has not been sent properly
import.romanization_warning: This title/tag contains a non-Latin alphabet language. You must add the language “Latin Alphabet (Romanization)” as well unless the title in non-Latin alphabet is a transcription of another language in its entirety.
import.contact_infos_warning: Your contact information will be shared with the database maintainers, who may contact you if they have any questions about your karaoke submission.
import.contact_infos_tooltip: Enter your contact details, so we can come to you if we have any questions about the karaoke.
import.from_display_type_tooltip: Select the tag type to be displayed with the title of the song. It will show as “[title] from [this tag type]”.

kara.other_liked: People who liked this also liked…

player.description: This video is hosted by {instance}. Consider using the application if you plan an event or stream!

layout.empty: We looked everywhere, we didn't find anything.
layout.suggest: Can't find what you're looking for?
layout.remove_tags: Did you try removing some of the filter tags from the search?
layout.end_favorites: This is the end of favorites.
layout.end_my_favorites: This is the end of your favorites.
layout.collections: {instance} provides many collections, choose the ones you are interested in.
layout.slogan: Come sing this song with Karaoke Mugen!
layout.end_users: You've reached the end of the user list (congratulations!).

app_banner.title: Did you know?
app_banner.description: Karaoke Mugen is also an application for Windows, macOS and Linux which allows you to manage playlists and karaoke events, may it be between friends, during anime conventions or even during your streams!
app_banner.more_features: There are lots more features than on {instance}!
app_banner.link: Check out the {link} to download the application for your computer.

menu.add_repository: Add this repository to your app

profile.private: Your profile is private, only you can see it.
profile.public_favorites: Your favorites are public. Click to hide them.
profile.private_favorites: Your favorites are private. Click to show them.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Login to view your favorites and edit your profile!

forgot_password.label: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.error: Could not reset your password: contact {email}.
forgot_password.error_fallback: the server's administrator your account belongs to
forgot_password.success: An email has been sent with a link to reset your password.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.subtitle: Register to save your favorites and create your profile!

banner.label: Banner
banner.change: To change your banner, go to the page of a karaoke and click the "Use as profile banner" button. Fully customizable banners is a donator feature.
banner.donator: Thanks for your support, you're awesome! You can upload a custom banner or use one from a karaoke of your choice.

flag_public.label: Public profile
flag_public.desc: By default, your account is visible via the user search and shows all the above informations with the exception of the e-mail address. If you uncheck this box, your account will not be available anymore in the search results (you will be the only one to be able to see it, once you've logged in).

flag_contributor_emails.label: My Contributions
flag_contributor_emails.checkbox: Send mails on your contributions' status changes
flag_contributor_emails.desc: By enabling this, you'll receive emails each time your submitted songs change status (accepted, refused, changes requested, etc.). Status changes occur when a database maintainer reviews your submitted songs.

flag_displayfavorites.label: Favorites
flag_displayfavorites.desc: Along with showing your public profile, you can showcase your favorites (therefore your taste) to everyone. This option is disabled by default. To show your favorites, your profile must be public in the first place.

flag_sendstats.label: Stats
flag_sendstats.checkbox: Use my favorites and karaoke requests for stats

add_repository.label: Add this repository to your Karaoke Mugen app!
add_repository.desc: You can add this repository to your Karaoke Mugen app by clicking on the button below. If Karaoke Mugen is not installed on your computer, this button will have no effect.
add_repository.download: The application can be downloaded here.
add_repository.manual: To manually add this repository, open your Karaoke Mugen application, add the {repository} repository to it, checking "{online}".

delete_account.label_admin: Do you really want to delete this account?
delete_account.label: Do you really want to delete your account?

suggest.title: Suggestion
suggest.subtitle: You couldn't find what you've searched for? You can submit a suggestion.

submitted.subtitle: Message heard loud and clear!
submitted.text: Your suggestion was received, you can check its status by clicking {here}.

import_suggestion.subtitle: The file must be a semicolon-separated CSV file with values in the format singer;title;language (in ISO 639-2 format for the language).

join_kara.label: Join a karaoke party
join_kara.desc: Enter a code to join an existing karaoke party
join_kara.help: Enter the session code (usually 4 letters) or the karaoke URL.
join_kara.error: The code is invalid, please check what you typed.

stats.label: Use my favorites and songs requests for stats
stats.desc: We use your favorites as well as the songs that you have requested during a session to make usage statistics (for example, to find out the most popular songs).
stats.refuse_desc: If you do not want to participate, even if it's anonymous, in these usage statistics, please let us know. If you refuse, your data will be ignored by the server and not sent by the Karaoke Mugen Application.
stats.change: You can change this at any time in your profile. Do you accept the usage of your stats?

set_banner.label: Choose a banner
set_banner.catch: Customize your profile with a wonderful banner! Scroll through the banners and confirm your choice.
set_banner.one: There is only one banner for audio only songs.

delete_playlist.label: Do you really want to delete playlist '{name}'?

add_duplicate_in_playlist.label: The karaoke is already in the playlist '{name}'.

toast.USER_ASCII_CHARACTERS_ONLY: Only alphanumeric characters in your username please (you can change your nickname later to whatever you wish).
toast.ADD_FAVORITE_ERROR: Unable to add this song to your favorites
toast.REMOVE_FAVORITE_ERROR: Unable to remove this song from your favorites
toast.PL_ADD_CONTRIBUTOR_NO_SELF_ERROR: Impossible to add yourself as a contributor
toast.PL_DELETE_SONG_ERROR: Error when deleting a song from the playlist
toast.PL_SHARE_CLIPBOARD_FAIL: Couldn't write playlist link to clipboard

header.title: Import suggestions
header.purpose: Here are some karaoke songs that are ready to be imported. You can search for a particular song or press the "Randomly select other songs" button. You can endorse a karaoke song by pressing "Yes!".
header.suggestion: If you still can't find the song you're looking for, click "Send Suggestion".

welcome.title: Where am I?
welcome.text: There are a lot of other karaoke databases: ones for UltraStar, Karawin or Karafun software for example. So here are some already available titles with their lyrics synchronized. We can't integrate immediately everything, so we'd like to know your priorities!
welcome.text2: You can either search something, or let randomness do the job. In both cases, we'd be grateful for the time you spend enhancing our databases. Thank you!
welcome.text3: If you want to ask for help, come and see us on {discord}. We're listening your suggestions and critics.

dashboard.submissions_status: Only submissions with the statuses 'Sent', 'In Review', and 'Changes requested' are counted toward the quota.

playlists.app_banner: This playlist is getting big! If you're planning an event or stream, consider using the application instead of {instance} for it. {instance} is NOT online 100% of the time.

submissions.cleanup: Submissions with the status 'Rejected', 'Accepted', or 'Changes requested' that are older than {days} days are automatically deleted.
submissions.contact_maintainers: If you need to contact the maintainers, you can reach them via:
submissions.quota: You can still send { songs } / { quota } songs.
